name: Technically Easy
description:
WASD to move

left click to shoot

space to open shop

In this game, you are a spaceship that must survive against the other spaceships. you can spend money gained from killing enemies to buy... wait, downgrades???

You must take a CHANCE by buying downgrades that make the game harder, but add money and score multipliers.

The goal of the game is to get a high score.

Please tell me any criticism you have! (I'm still a new game developer)

sorry i didn't have time for a menu.
